titles.title: To provide for a limitation on availability of funds for House of Representatives, Salaries and Expenses of the Office of Diversity and Inclusion for fiscal year 2024.
To provide for a limitation on availability of funds for House of Representatives, Salaries and Expenses of the Office of Diversity and Inclusion for fiscal year 2024.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary: This bill specifies that no FY2024 funding is authorized to be appropriated or made available for salaries and expenses of the House Office of Diversity and Inclusion.
